name: Service Quality Monitoring File
summary: Learn about .SQM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Service Quality Monitoring is used by Windows Live Messenger, MS Office, and various other programs. SQM files are typically stored in the root level (C:\) of the user's hard drive.

description: Log file created by the Service Quality Monitor program that records events on Windows computers; may include application use, performance, and errors from a program; SQM data can be sent to Microsoft, which helps the company fix and improve software programs.
